instructions: Make sure you can make and receive Wi-Fi calls on iPad . Go to Settings > Accessibility > RTT. Turn on Software RTT, then do any of the following. Tap Relay Number, then enter the phone number to use for relay calls using Software RTT/TTY. Turn on Send Immediately to send each character as you type. Turn off to complete messages before sending. When RTT is turned on, the RTT icon appears in the status bar at the top of the screen.
